patthana3.10:6.1: Sārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:7.1: Sārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā sappaccayaṃ akusalaṃ, evaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:8.1: Sārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:9.1: Anārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:10.1: Sārammaṇaṃ abyākatañca anārammaṇaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:11.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:12.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.10:14.1: Sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:15.1: Sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.10:16.1: Anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:17.1: Sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.10:17.4: Anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.10:18.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.10:21.1: Cittaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:22.1: Nocittaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:22.2: Nocittaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:22.3: Nocittaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto kusalo ca nocitto kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:23.1: Cittaṃ kusalañca nocittaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:24.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:25.1: Naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.10:27.1: Nocitto kusalo dhammo nocittassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:27.2: Nocitto kusalo dhammo cittassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:27.3: Nocitto kusalo dhammo cittassa kusalassa ca nocittassa kusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:28.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava … pe … sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:32.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:33.1: Cittaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:34.1: Nocittaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:34.2: Nocittaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:34.3: Nocittaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto akusalo ca nocitto akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:35.1: Cittaṃ akusalañca nocittaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:36.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:36.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Cittadukakusalasadisaṃ, nahetuyāpi kattabbaṃ. Sahajātavārampi … pe … pañhāvārampi kātabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:37.1: Cittaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:38.1: Nocittaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:38.2: Nocittaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:38.3: Nocittaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto abyākato ca nocitto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:39.1: Cittaṃ abyākatañca nocittaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:40.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:41.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca … pe … napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte pañca … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.10:43.1: Nocitto abyākato dhammo nocittassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:44.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava … pe … sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke pañca, āhāre indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:47.1: Cetasikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:47.2: Cetasikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:47.3: Cetasikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo ca acetasiko kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:48.1: Acetasikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:49.1: Cetasikaṃ kusalañca acetasikaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:50.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:51.1: Naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca … pe … navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.10:52.1: Cetasiko kusalo dhammo cetasikassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:53.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (ādimhi tīṇi, sahajātādhipati, majjhimesu tīsu majjhimānulomikāyeva pañhā, sahajātādhipati) anantare nava … pe … sahajāte pañca … pe … upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:54.1: Cetasikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:54.2: Cetasikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:54.3: Cetasikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo ca acetasiko akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:55.1: Acetasikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:56.1: Cetasikaṃ akusalañca acetasikaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:57.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:58.1: Cetasikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:58.2: Cetasikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:58.3: Cetasikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko abyākato ca acetasiko abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:59.1: Acetasikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:60.1: Cetasikaṃ abyākatañca acetasikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:61.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca, kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:62.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava (sabbe kātabbā) … pe … nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.10:63.1: Cetasiko abyākato dhammo cetasikassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:64.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (ettha chasu sahajātādhipati), anantare nava … pe … sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:68.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:69.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:71.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:72.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:75.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:75.2: Cittasampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:75.3: Cittasampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato ca cittavippayutto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:76.1: Cittavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:76.2: Cittavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:76.3: Cittavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato ca cittavippayutto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:77.1: Cittasampayuttaṃ abyākatañca cittavippayuttaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:77.2: Cittasampayuttaṃ abyākatañca cittavippayuttaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:77.3: Cittasampayuttaṃ abyākatañca cittavippayuttaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato ca cittavippayutto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:78.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme nava, vipāke nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:79.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … napurejāte nava … pe … nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve … pe … novigate dve.
patthana3.10:81.1: Cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:82.1: Cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.10:83.1: Cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:84.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.10:87.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:88.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:89.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:90.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:91.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:92.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:93.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:94.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:95.1: (Yathā cittasampayuttadukaṃ abyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi … pe … pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:98.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:98.2: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.10:100.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalañca nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:101.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:102.1: Naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca … pe … navippayutte pañca.
patthana3.10:103.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:104.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca … pe … upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:105.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:106.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:107.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalañca nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:108.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana3.10:111.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:112.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ abyākatañca nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:113.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha nava), purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:114.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke cha, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana3.10:116.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:117.1: Cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:118.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), purejāte nava, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava (cittasamuṭṭhānamūlaṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro kātabbo. Nocittasamuṭṭhāno cittasamuṭṭhānassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro ghaṭane majjhe kabaḷīkāro āhāro), indriye nava (rūpajīvitindriyaṃ ekaṃ), jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana3.10:119.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:122.1: Cittasahabhuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:122.2: Cittasahabhuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:122.3: Cittasahabhuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū kusalo ca nocittasahabhū kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:123.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:124.1: Cittasahabhuṃ kusalañca nocittasahabhuṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:125.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana3.10:129.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana3.10:132.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.10:134.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:134.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā cetasikadukamūlā tīṇi gamanā, evaṃ imepi tīṇi gamanā kātabbā. Sahajātavārampi … pe … pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.10:137.1: Cittānuparivattiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.10:140.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana3.10:145.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:147.1: Cittānuparivattiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:148.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:151.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:151.2: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:151.3: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo ca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:152.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:153.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.10:155.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.10:162.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:163.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.10:165.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:166.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (ettha chasu sahajātādhipati), anantare nava (sabbattha nava), purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.

patthana3.10:181.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana3.10:184.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.

patthana3.10:188.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:189.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ kusalañca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:190.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:192.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:193.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:195.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:196.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:199.1: Ajjhattikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:200.1: Bāhiraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:200.2: Bāhiraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:200.3: Bāhiraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko kusalo ca bāhiro kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:201.1: Ajjhattikaṃ kusalañca bāhiraṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:202.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:203.1: Ajjhattikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:204.1: Bāhiraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:204.2: Bāhiraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:204.3: Bāhiraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko akusalo ca bāhiro akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:205.1: Ajjhattikaṃ akusalañca bāhiraṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:206.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:207.1: Ajjhattikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:208.1: Bāhiraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:209.1: Ajjhattikaṃ abyākatañca bāhiraṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:210.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe pañca, nissaye nava, upanissaye pañca, purejāte pañca, āsevane pañca, kamme … pe … magge nava, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:211.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne pañca, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
patthana3.10:213.1: Bāhiro abyākato dhammo bāhirassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:214.1: Bāhiro abyākato dhammo bāhirassa abyākatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:215.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (ajjhattiko bāhirassa gamanakāle sahajātādhipati, majjhe tīsupi sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava (ārammaṇapurejātampi vatthupurejātampi), pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava (tiṇṇannaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro), indriye nava (tiṇṇannaṃ rūpajīvitindriyaṃ), jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:218.1: Noupādā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:219.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:221.1: Noupādā akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:222.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:224.1: Upādā abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:225.1: Noupādā abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:225.2: Noupādā abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:225.3: Noupādā abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādā abyākato ca noupādā abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.10:226.1: Upādā abyākatañca noupādā abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:227.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe pañca … pe … purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:228.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca … pe … napurejāte pañca … pe … nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, naāhāre tīṇi, naindriye tīṇi, najhāne tīṇi, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana3.10:231.1: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:232.1: Upādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.10:233.1: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.10:234.1: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:235.1: Upādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.10:236.1: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:237.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cha, indriye satta, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.10:240.1: Anupādinnaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:241.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.10:241.4: (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi … pe … pañhāvārepi ekaṃ sappaccayakusalasadisaṃ.)
patthana3.10:242.1: Anupādinnaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:244.1: Upādinnaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:245.1: Anupādinnaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.10:246.1: Upādinnaṃ abyākatañca anupādinnaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana3.10:246.2: upādinne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana3.10:247.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.10:248.1: Nahetuyā pañca, naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā pañca … pe … napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke dve, naāhāre dve, naindriye dve, najhāne dve, namagge pañca, nasampayutte cattāri, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
patthana3.10:250.1: Upādinno abyākato dhammo upādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:251.1: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.10:252.1: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.10:253.1: Upādinno abyākato dhammo upādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana3.10:254.1: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana3.10:255.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri (upādinnamūlake dve, anupādinnamūlake dve), adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte cha, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre nava, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
